name: Mysteries of the Hidden Glade
description: A sealed forest awaits.|Rumors speak of a sealed glade, hidden away from the world. Deep within, a creature of power guards a great treasure.

text: Greetings, adventurer. Have you heard of the Hidden Glade?
It's a mystical forest sealed by our ancestors due to the danger within.
Could you perhaps venture in and discover its secrets?
completedText: Find the entrance to the Hidden Glade.

text: A sealed gate stands before you, adorned with ancient symbols.
By solving a riddle, the gate slowly opens, revealing the glade within.
Deep within the glade, an altar beckons. Placing an offering might grant you safe passage.
completedText: Seek the creature guarding the treasure.

text: A creature of immense power stands before you, its eyes watching your every move.
To reach the treasure, you must first defeat this guardian.
Having defeated the guardian, a chest materializes before you.
Inside, you find a ring that radiates energy.

popup.title: Quest completed!
popup.text: @green@You have completed @crimson@Mysteries of the Hidden Glade@green@. The glade's treasure, the Glade Ring, is now yours!
